title: Star in your favorite movie, TV shows and sports clips with FaceM.
text:
ShakeM and Sony team up with its patent pending face replacement APP. FaceM.Sep 8th 2015 FaceM announces it’s new APP - one of the hottest new video editing tools for social media.
NY, NY
FaceM’s new, patent pending video app is an exciting addition to the ShakeM family of video editing services for social media. Samples of this new App can be seen on the following links: http://www.facem-app.com/images/public/facem_teaser.mp4
Facem’s streamlined approach makes it easy for anyone to place their own or any face onto a movie trailer, music video and /or sport highlight clips then share the experience on social media utilizing their smartphone, tablet or laptop.
Jurgen Pfitzner ShakeM´s CEO stated “our partnership with Sony Pictures Home Entertainment provides a fantastic platform for the launch of FaceM.’ Sony Pictures library of movies and television shows offers users thousands of options to choose from and then become the leading character of their favorite clip.
According to Norbert Petter the COO of ShakeM, “FaceM will be the easiest and most user-friendly face replacement APP available on the market. We believe there will be many future applications and opportunities, with Gaming being the most exciting in the near term”.
FaceM is currently available on Laptops’, Tablets and most Android devices; IOS follows shortly.
Please contact Jürgen Pfitzner or David Hess if there are any questions regarding ShakeM.
About Petter.Letter
Petter.Letter doing business as Shakem is a leading edge video creation and editing company based in Germany. Shakem has successfully developed partnership agreements with leading technology and communications companies including Microsoft, Intel, Hewlett-Packard, VKontakte, and Sony Picture Entertainment.
Shakem is led by a management team with a proven track record across communication, mobile, web marketing and product development, supported by a highly qualified team of application software developers.
